title: Ubuntu 12.04 : Java applet not working with open jdk (Solved)
description: I have install open jdk on ubuntu 12.04 LTS  64 bit  but when i used websites that runs on java , I get the errror of java not install or been disable in your browser. This is how you can solve this problem first check you browser ( about://plugin in the url box. ) if java has been disable and if it's not there than you need to install  ice tea plugin to install it type this command on terminal  sudo apt-get install icedtea-7-plugin  This will work, if not let me know through comments  Want to know more about us:  Website :   Facebook:   Twitter :    Google plus :
